summary: In the face of demise in his values, a socialist in England decides to form a gang and rob banks for a living.
cast: Robert Carlyle|Ray Winstone|Steve Sweeney|Gerry Conlon|Leon Black|David Boateng|Lena Headey|Eddie Nestor|Steven Waddington|Christine Tremarco|Andrew Tiernan|Sue Johnston|Damon Albarn|Phil Davis|Hazel Douglas|Arthur Whybrow|Kevin T. Walsh|Peter Vaughan|Elaine Lordan|Paul Green|Natalie Morse|Kim Taylforth|Giles Ward|Peter Lovstrom|Kit Jackson|Peter Ferdinando|Frank Boyce|Robert Elms|Shireen Anwar|Jan Denman|Kay Harrison|Della McCrae|Suresh Maru|Dick Powell|Bill Spenser
title: El rostro
